name: Kombubeasties (ustwogames)
description:
Kombubeasties is a resource management cultured foods adventure! Using Yeast and Bacteria to turn this tea into a tasty brew, the player must master this biome of funky ferments and brew perfect batches of Kombucha before time runs out! 

Made for the ustwo games game-jam 2021!

Team:

Joel Beardshaw (https://twitter.com/RobotJoel)

Jane Campbell (https://twitter.com/janey_campbell) 

 Ian Zell (https://twitter.com/IanZell)
